title: Can't transfer from NA to OCE
body:
Hi there,

I am trying to transfer my NA account OCE, however every time I try to open the shop I receive and error or it remains black. Which means I can't issue the transfer from NA to OCE.

What is the best way to resolve this?

I have a main on OCE now, didn't transfer my real main last year so now is a good opportunity to do so!

replies.body: Because you're transferring from a continent to another, your clock might not be synced to the NA store. Try syncing it to the internet server.
